summary: Boyz II Men is an American singing group from Philadelphia. They're famous for their emotional songs and beautiful harmonies. The group started in 1985 and became popular in the 1990s with hits like "Motownphilly" and "End of the Road," which spent 13 weeks at number one on the Billboard charts. Originally a quartet, they've been a trio since 2003. They've won four Grammy Awards and are still performing today.
title: Boyz II Men
